rows.label: qst106020_msg0001
rows.name:
Now, is time to begin
upgrading of Hana!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0002
rows.name:
Tora, I prepare workshop for
upgrade process. While I do this,
you gather necessary materials!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0003
rows.name:
All right, Dad! Oh yes -
Boss and friends help too?

rows.label: qst106020_msg0004
rows.name: Of course we'll help!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0005
rows.name:
Necessary material is 10 Golden
Cog. Can be found by salvaging.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0006
rows.name: Leave it to me, then!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0007
rows.name: Mo-mo...! Tora counting on Boss!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0008
rows.name:
Masterpon should learn to
do more things for self...

rows.label: qst106020_msg0009
rows.name: Hana so harsh!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0010
rows.name:
Hana really does know how to throw
shade sometimes, doesn't she. Did
you design her that way, Tora?

rows.label: qst106020_msg0011
rows.name:
T-Tora not know what Nia
mean! Tora not weird person
who like being insulted!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0012
rows.name:
Tora have no idea how Hana end
up with personality like this!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0013
rows.name:
Would make Tora happy if Hana learn
to act more polite like Kiku!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0014
rows.name:
Tora only say that because he
not see how harsh Kiku can be.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0015
rows.name:
When cleaning up, Kiku always
try to throw me out with trash.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0016
rows.name:
When inside house, Masterpon
generally fall into same
category as household waste.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0017
rows.name:
See? See? Kiku no more
respectful than Hana really!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah, these two are
sisters all right...

rows.label: qst106020_msg0019
rows.name:
Less complaining and more
upgrading younger sister of
Kiku into wonderful new form!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0020
rows.name:
Kiku having difficulty
containing anticipation!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0021
rows.name: Right you are, right you are.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0022
rows.name:
Tora, hurry and bring
necessary materials.

rows.label: qst106020_msg0023
rows.name: Of course, Dad!

rows.label: qst106020_msg0024
rows.name:
What is point of Masterpon
getting motivated when
Rex do all hard work?

rows.label: qst106020_msg0025
rows.name: Hana still too harsh!
